QuestData.Title: Eggs for Dubra'Jin
QuestData.Description: How ya doin', mon? Thinkin' ya might be helpin' me out? Bah'Kini be needin' lots o' the raptor eggs to be sacrificin' to Dubra'Jin.$B$BHow ya thinkin' we not be overrun yet by the Drakkari? Dubra'Jin be lendin' us his aid!$B$BWe need ya to gather up the raptor eggs from around the trees outside here in Gundrak. Sometimes the raptors carry 'em to keep 'em warm, too.
QuestData.LogDescription: Ha'wana at Dubra'Jin needs you to collect 12 Gundrak Raptor Eggs.
QuestData.CompletionText: Who woulda thought the great Dubra'Jin be wantin' so many eggs? What he gonna do with them anyway?
QuestData.RewardText: One, two, three,... hehe, that be a good number o' them, mon! Now we be safe for quite some time!
